title: Help Your Protector

How to unlock Help Your Protector

Progress to the Wyrm's Landing in Act 3.

Help Your Protector Rewards

Astral-Touched Tadpole

Baldur's Gate 3 Help Your Protector Walkthrough

After beginning Act 3, you'll find yourself at Camp in the Wyrm's Landing. Interact with your bedroll to go to bed. Your character will have trouble sleeping and when they're about to settle down, th
